shri lanka manawa himikam komisan sabhawehi mulika karyayan athara mulika manawa himikam ullanghanayanhidi wimasim saha wimarshanaya kirima, shri lanka rajaye siyaluma kriyapatipatin, shri lanka aandukrama wyawasthawa magin sahathikakara athi mulika ayithiwasikamwalata anuwa itu kirimata waga bala ganima, mulika ayithiwasikamwalata anukulawa nithi sampadanaya kirimatath, paripalana magapenwim kirimatath rajayata upades saha sahayogaya dima, jathika nithi paddhathiya saha palana kramaya jathyantharawa piligath manawa ayithiwasikamwalata awanatha wemin kriyathmaka kirimata rajayata upades dima, manawa himikam kshethraye jathyanthara manawa himikam giwisum saha anekuth jathyanthara mewalam upayogi karaganimata rajayata upades dima, saha rata thula manawa himikam pilibanda danuwath bawa prawardhanaya kirima weyi.
